articles.title: Coronavirus Live Updates: Trump Warns of ‘a Lot of Death’ and New Virus Hot Spots
articles.description: The president veered from grim warnings to baseless assurances in a single news conference as he predicted a surging death toll in what may be “the toughest week” of the coronavirus pandemic.
articles.content: During a crisis, heroes come to the forefront because many of our basic human needs are threatened, including our need for certainty, meaning and purpose, self-esteem, and sense of belonging with others, said Elaine Kinsella, a psychology professor at the Uni… [+1159 chars]
